text: It takes one second to appear because I added a setTimeout due to the time the iframe takes to appear, so when it does, I change its width

there're two classes for that same element because when you open the webpage it's supposed to be "display: none" and then when you click on the whatsapp icon, it has "display: block", so it is visible
I don't know if that's the right way to do it
perhaps that's what's making the <iframe> to appear the wrong way
